title: Ep145 Nun Crimes
description: This week, the gals take their sacrament and discuss some unholy homicides. Topics include a very violent cardinal sin, a sister with a secret, and some pioneering LGBT religious. Pour a glass of OneHope's Argentina Uco Valley Malbec, say six Hail Marys, and tune in for Nun Crimes.
itunes:author: Wine & Crime Podcast
